query.text:
traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| where case (isempty(ApiController), true, customDimensions.apiController==ApiController)
| where case (isempty(ApiAction), true, customDimensions.apiAction==ApiAction)
| extend activityId = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityId)
| extend httpStatus = toint(customDimensions.httpStatus)
| extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| extend dur = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| where httpStatus >= 500
| summarize Total=count()
by case(apiController == apiAction, apiController, isnull(apiController), apiAction, strcat(apiController, '/', apiAction))//, cloud_RoleInstance
| order by Total desc
| limit 10

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| where case (isempty(ApiController), true, customDimensions.apiController==ApiController)
| where case (isempty(ApiAction), true, customDimensions.apiAction==ApiAction)
| extend activityId = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityId)
| extend httpStatus = toint(customDimensions.httpStatus)
| extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| extend dur = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| where httpStatus >= 400 and httpStatus < 500
| summarize Total=count()
by case(apiController == apiAction, apiController, isnull(apiController), apiAction, strcat(apiController, '/', apiAction))
| order by Total desc
| limit 10

tiles.title: Overall Table Summary (RS related Table can be filtered by "ApiAction","ApiController"."ScaleUnit and "ServerName")

query.text:
traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| where case (isempty(ApiController), true, customDimensions.apiController==ApiController)
| where case (isempty(ApiAction), true, customDimensions.apiAction==ApiAction)
| extend httpStatus = toint(customDimensions.httpStatus)
| extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| extend dur = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| summarize 
ResponseTime50=percentile(dur, 50),
ResponseTime99=percentile(dur, 99)
by bin(timestamp, 1m), Machine=case(cloud_RoleName has "dr", "su-dr", strcat(cloud_RoleName, ':', cloud_RoleInstance))
| order by Machine desc

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| where case (isempty(ApiController), true, customDimensions.apiController==ApiController)
| where case (isempty(ApiAction), true, customDimensions.apiAction==ApiAction)
| extend activityId = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityId)
| extend httpStatus = toint(customDimensions.httpStatus)
| extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| extend dur = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| summarize 
Total = count()
by bin(timestamp, 1m), httpStatus

tiles.title: SQL or RTS Overall (in ms) - filtered by "ScaleUnit" and "ServerName")

query.text:
traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId == 1809 or customDimensions .EventId == 1804 or customDimensions.EventId == 6902
| extend activityId = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityId)
| extend latency = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| extend sqlOrRTS = coalesce(tostring(customDimensions.fromClause), tostring(customDimensions.storedProcedureName), tostring(customDimensions.methodName))
| extend sqlOrRTSFailed = case(customDimensions.callWasSuccessful == "False" or customDimensions.success == "False", 1, 0)
| summarize Total= count(), FailedCount=sum(sqlOrRTSFailed), percentiles(latency, 50, 90, 99, 100) by sqlOrRTS
| order by Total desc

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| where case (isempty(ApiController), true, customDimensions.apiController==ApiController)
| where case (isempty(ApiAction), true, customDimensions.apiAction==ApiAction)
| extend activityId = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityId)
| extend httpStatus = toint(customDimensions.httpStatus)
| extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| extend dur = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| summarize Total=count(), 
Failure=countif(httpStatus>=500), 
ClientFailure=countif(httpStatus>=400 and httpStatus<500), 
ResponseTime50=percentile(dur, 50),
ResponseTime99=percentile(dur, 99),
ResponseTime999=percentile(dur, 99.9),
ResponseTime100=percentile(dur, 100)
by apiController, apiAction//, cloud_RoleInstance
| order by Failure desc, ClientFailure desc, Total desc

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| where case (isempty(ApiController), true, customDimensions.apiController==ApiController)
| where case (isempty(ApiAction), true, customDimensions.apiAction==ApiAction)
| extend activityId = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityId)
| extend httpStatus = toint(customDimensions.httpStatus)
| extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| extend dur = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| where httpStatus >= 400 and httpStatus < 500
| summarize ResponseTime99 = percentile(dur/1000.0, 99),
ResponseTimeCountLongerThan5Seconds=countif(dur>=5000),
ResponseTimeCountLongerThan10Seconds=countif(dur>=10000)
by cloud_RoleName
| order by (ResponseTimeCountLongerThan5Seconds+ ResponseTimeCountLongerThan10Seconds) desc
| limit 10

traces
| where timestamp between (['Start'] .. ['End']) // Time range filtering
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId == 5009
| where customDimensions.apiController == ['ApiController'] or isempty(['ApiController'])
| where customDimensions.apiAction == ['ApiAction'] or isempty(['ApiAction'])
| extend latency = tolong(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| summarize Total_API_Calls = count() by bin(timestamp, 1m)

let CDate = Start - 14d;
let Latency = (traces
    | where timestamp between (['Start'] .. ['End']) // Time range filtering
    | where customDimensions.EventId == 5009
    | where customDimensions.apiController == ['ApiController'] or isempty(['ApiController'])
    | where customDimensions.apiAction == ['ApiAction'] or isempty(['ApiAction'])
    | extend latency = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds) // executionTimeMs RSSU
    | extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
    | extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
    | extend api = strcat(apiController,"\\",apiAction)
    | summarize count(), avg(latency), percentiles(latency, 50, 95) by api
    | order by percentile_latency_95 desc
);
let 14Days_AVG_Latency = (traces 
    | where timestamp between(CDate .. Start)
    | where customDimensions.EventId == 5009
    | where customDimensions.apiController == ['ApiController'] or isempty(['ApiController'])
    | where customDimensions.apiAction == ['ApiAction'] or isempty(['ApiAction'])
    | extend latency = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds) // executionTimeMs RSSU
    | extend apiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
    | extend apiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
    | extend api = strcat(apiController,"\\",apiAction)
    | summarize avg(latency) by api
    | project-rename 14Days_AVG_Latency = avg_latency
);
Latency
| join kind = inner (14Days_AVG_Latency) on api
| project-away api1
| extend Deviation = avg_latency - 14Days_AVG_Latency
| project api, count_, round(14Days_AVG_Latency,3), round(avg_latency,3), toint(Deviation), percentile_latency_50, percentile_latency_95
| project api, count_, round(14Days_AVG_Latency,3), round(avg_latency,3), toint(Deviation), percentile_latency_50, percentile_latency_95
| order by Deviation desc

let targetApis = datatable(api:string)
[
"/Commerce/Products/GetCategoryPaths",
"/Commerce/Products/GetActivePrices",
"/Commerce/Carts",
"/Commerce/Carts/Copy", "/Commerce/Carts/RemoveCartLines",
"/Commerce/Carts/Checkout",
"/Commerce/Customers"
];
let targetApi = "";
let latencyCap = 10000.0;
let window = 1m;
traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| extend ScaleUnitId = tostring(customDimensions.ScaleUnitId)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| where case (isempty(ServerName), true, cloud_RoleInstance in (ServerName))
| where customDimensions.EventId == 5009
| extend HttpResultStatus = tostring(customDimensions .httpStatus)
| extend RequestUri = parse_url(tostring(customDimensions .requestUri))
| extend Url = customDimensions .requestUri
| extend Path = tostring(RequestUri.Path)
| extend NormalizedPath = replace(@'\([^)]*\)', "", Path)
| extend LowerNormalizedPath = tolower(NormalizedPath)
| join kind=inner
(targetApis | extend LowerNormalizedPath = tolower(api))
on LowerNormalizedPath
| extend Latency = tolong(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
//| where HttpResultStatus == 200
| where targetApi == "" or NormalizedPath contains targetApi
| extend HttpResultStatus = toint(customDimensions .httpStatus)
| extend ResponseType = case(HttpResultStatus < 400, "Success", HttpResultStatus < 500, "Warning", "Error")
| extend IsFailure = case(HttpResultStatus < 500, false, true)
//| order by timestamp desc | limit 10000
| summarize
//Average = avg(Latency),
//CappedLatency = min_of(avg(Latency), latencyCapForGraph) ,
CallCount = count() ,
Latency_Avg = avg(Latency),
Latency_p50 = percentile(Latency, 50),
Latency_p75 = percentile(Latency, 75),
Latency_p90 = percentile(Latency, 90),
SuccessCount = countif(not(IsFailure)),
FailureCount = countif(IsFailure)
//max(Latency),
by bin(timestamp, window)
, LowerNormalizedPath
//,HttpResultStatus
| extend FailureRate = todecimal(FailureCount) / todecimal(CallCount)
| extend Reliability = 1.0 - FailureRate
| extend Latency_CappedAvg = case(Latency_Avg > latencyCap, latencyCap, Latency_Avg)
| order by timestamp desc, LowerNormalizedPath

let targetApis = datatable(api:string)
[
"/Commerce/Products/GetCategoryPaths",
"/Commerce/Products/GetActivePrices",
"/Commerce/Carts",
"/Commerce/Carts/Copy", "/Commerce/Carts/RemoveCartLines",

| extend HttpResultStatus = tostring(customDimensions .httpStatus)
| extend RequestUri = parse_url(tostring(customDimensions .requestUri))

| extend Path = tostring(RequestUri.Path)
| extend NormalizedPath = replace(@'\([^)]*\)', "", Path)
| extend LowerNormalizedPath = tolower(NormalizedPath)
| join kind=inner
(targetApis | extend LowerNormalizedPath = tolower(api))

| extend Latency = tolong(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
//| where HttpResultStatus == 200
| where targetApi == "" or NormalizedPath contains targetApi
| extend HttpResultStatus = toint(customDimensions .httpStatus)
| extend ResponseType = case(HttpResultStatus < 400, "Success", HttpResultStatus < 500, "Warning", "Error")
| extend IsFailure = case(HttpResultStatus < 500, false, true)
//| order by timestamp desc | limit 10000
| summarize
//Average = avg(Latency),
//CappedLatency = min_of(avg(Latency), latencyCapForGraph) ,
CallCount = count() ,
Latency_Avg = avg(Latency),
Latency_p50 = percentile(Latency, 50),
Latency_p75 = percentile(Latency, 75),

SuccessCount = countif(not(IsFailure)),
FailureCount = countif(IsFailure)
//max(Latency),
by bin(timestamp, window)

| extend FailureRate = todecimal(FailureCount) / todecimal(CallCount)
| extend Reliability = 1.0 - FailureRate
| extend Latency_CappedAvg = case(Latency_Avg > latencyCap, latencyCap, Latency_Avg)
| order by timestamp desc, LowerNormalizedPath

traces
| where customDimensions.EventId == 5009 // designates a RetailServer finished 
| extend executionTimeMilliseconds = toint(customDimensions.executionTimeMilliseconds)
| extend apiAction = customDimensions.apiAction
| project executionTimeMilliseconds, apiAction
| summarize NumAllCalls=count(), AvgDuration = avg(executionTimeMilliseconds),
percentile90 =percentiles(executionTimeMilliseconds, 90) by tostring(apiAction)
| where percentile90 > 100
| order by percentile90 desc
| project apiAction, percentile90
| render columnchart

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where customDimensions.EventId == 5009
| extend ApiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend ApiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| summarize Total = count()
by ApiAction
| order by Total desc

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where customDimensions.EventId==5009
| extend ApiController = tostring(customDimensions.apiController)
| extend ApiAction = tostring(customDimensions.apiAction)
| summarize Total=count()
by ApiController
| order by Total desc

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| summarize any(cloud_RoleName) by cloud_RoleName
| order by cloud_RoleName

traces
| where timestamp between (Start .. End)
| where case (isempty(ScaleUnitName), true, cloud_RoleName in (ScaleUnitName))
| summarize any(cloud_RoleInstance) by cloud_RoleInstance
| order by cloud_RoleInstance desc
